articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Samsung reveals Galaxy Z TriFold with 10-inch foldable screen, astronomical price - Ars Technica
articles.description: Samsung’s long-awaited tri-fold phone is launching in Korea this month, with a US launch early next year.

articles.author: Vincent Acovino
articles.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a technical marvel and game design nightmare - NPR
articles.description: After a decade of development, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a beautiful but befuddling game full of misguided design decisions and annoying sidekicks.
articles.content: Metroid Prime 4 stumbled multiple times before being completely scrapped and restarted over the decade it took to make. Although it found its way back to Retro Studios, the team behind the original t… [+2796 chars]

articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Amazon Music’s 2025 Delivered is now here to compete with Spotify Wrapped - TechCrunch
articles.description: With 2025 Delivered, users will see a recap of their listening trends, showcasing their top artists, favorite songs, and preferred genres, along with stats for audiobooks and podcasts.
articles.content: Amazon Music announced on Tuesday the launch of 2025 Delivered, the platforms take on Spotifys popular Wrapped experience. The feature offers users a personalized annual summary of their music-listen… [+1733 chars]
